meanings.definition: Give off a strong, unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The garbage left out in the sun reeks.
meanings.sent2: The old socks in the locker room reek.
meanings.sent3: The skunk sprayed and now the whole forest reeks!
meanings.sent4: The fish market reeks of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The foul smell from the sewer grate reeks up into the street.

meanings.definition: A series or sequence of things or events.
meanings.sent1: The reeks of books on the shelf were neatly arranged.
meanings.sent2: The reeks of exams made the students nervous.
meanings.sent3: The reeks of movies at the film festival were all comedies.
meanings.sent4: The reeks of colors in the sunset painted the sky.
meanings.sent5: The reeks of waves crashing on the shore created a calming rhythm.
